features: ENHANCED SOFTENING EFFICACY: Dropps In-Wash Fabric Softener Pods work from the start of the wash cycle. Pair with your detergent to infuse a subtle, pleasant scent while deeply conditioning fibers. These pods distribute evenly, ensuring consistent softening without the hassle of additional steps, simplifying your routine while delivering superior fabric care.

SOFT TOUCH FORMULATION: Dropps Fabric Softener Pods utilize mineral-based components to ensure your laundry comes out soft and smooth without any sticky residue. Our precision-measured pods dispense the ideal amount for a clean that leaves fabrics feeling cozy and fresh, free from the drawbacks of traditional liquid conditioners and dryer sheets.

FOR ALL MACHINES & WASH CYCLES: Our fabric softener is the epitome of laundry convenience. Formulated for universal use, these pods are compatible with all washing machine types—HE, standard, front, and top-loading—providing efficiency across all water temperatures, including cold cycles for energy conservation. The unit dose pods offer an effortless, spill-free, and mess-free solution for any load size, ensuring your laundry routine is as simple as it is effective.

LOW WASTE PACKAGING: Our recyclable cardboard boxes are a testament to our commitment to smart living. They're designed to be space-efficient, fitting neatly into limited storage areas, ensuring your home stays uncluttered. Trust Dropps for an effective wash, a tidier laundry room, and a package that's considerate of both your living space and broader environmental well-being.

A COMPANY YOU CAN TRUST: We have over 20 years in crafting advanced cleaning solutions and an enduring commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. As a B Corp certified entity, we embody the highest standards for social and environmental performance, transparency, and accountability. We take pride in our stringent standards for product development and manufacturing, all within the USA, ensuring a positive effect on our customers, the community, and the environment.

All-in-one powerhouse helps remove odors and stubborn stains, keeps fabrics smelling fresh, and helps colors stay bold and bright All-in-one powerhouse helps remove odors and stubborn stains, keeps fabrics smelling fresh, and helps colors stay bold and bright Our most gentle clean, for sensitive skin and natural fabrics. For stuck-on messes and sparkling glasses Color-safe bleach alternative Scent Type Relaxing lavender, cool eucalyptus. Like a magic portal to the spa... in your laundry room. Relaxing lavender, cool eucalyptus. Like a magic portal to the spa... in your laundry room. A hint of citrus, a touch of pine. Like your laundry was line-dried in the sun. Zero. Zilch. Nada. Like a whole lot of sweet nothingness. Fresh, crisp lemon delivers a light citrusy zing. Like a deep breath of clean. Zero. Zilch. Nada. Like a whole lot of sweet nothingness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: This product makes your clothes smell amazing and also keeps them feeling super soft. No need for dryer sheets because the clothes do not come out static ridden once dried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Teens Learning Laundry
reviews.reviewText: I give these pods a 👍 and a 5 star rating. My teen kiddos are learning how to do laundry. Using pods instead of measuring liquid leaves less mess and is easier for the kids to manage. The softener dispenser on their washing machine does not work so the kids were pouring the softener directly onto the clothes. If you have ever done that before, ✋️ I have, you know it can ruin your clothes. So that's another plus for using these pods. The only needed improvement I notice is that they really don't put out the scent I was expecting. The scent is very faint so I use gain dryer sheets to get the clothes smelling good. However, this could just be my issue because I like a strong scent on my clothes. With that said, I most likely will purchase the softener pods again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use the dishwasher dropps, so decided to try these. They are fine, except i have a washer with automatic dispensing and it doesn’t work very well in the softener dispenser. I have to cut open the outer wrap and pour contents into the dispenser, the wrapper does not disintegrate in the dispenser otherwise. It does have a nice, subtle scent, not obnoxious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t know why I didn’t switch sooner
reviews.reviewText: First-you have to drop them IN the washer WITH the clothes or they will not dissolve properly in the detergent tray. I use cool water 80% of the time and have zero troubles dissolving. These are great. My clothes feel good(not filmy) soft, static free, smell neutral to a light scent. The reason for the switch was to stop adding plastic jugs to the landfill. These come in a small cardboard box 100% recyclable and I’m extremely happy with all of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't bother. It doesn't work. Not even a little.
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping to find a fabric softener that didn't require huge jugs and without costing an arm and a leg. I had hoped this might be a viable answer. It was a total failure. The product came in a nice small cardboard box with little sachets of powdered softener in it. I was anxious to try it out and I am 100% disappointed. The outer pack dissolved well, but the powder in it only partially dissolved. Moreover it didn't soften or remove the static and it provided no scent whatsoever. This was supposed to have a fresh scent, and it does when you smell the actual sachet, but it did not smell while in use and the clothes have no scent after having been washed. I even tried dissolving one in a small bucket of hot water and it still failed to dissolve and the water didn't seem to feel like it should. 100% total failure on all counts. I will be returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Upon arrival a few pods were completed busted open and the powder inside leaked everywhere. Very messy. I guess the positive is that they smell pleasant. Have yet to use, will update after use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great - clothes are soft
reviews.reviewText: These little fabric softener pods are great. I love that I don't have to lift a heavy plastic jug of liquid softener around, and these would be great for trips to the laundrymat. The pods completely dissolve in the wash, I've used half a box and have never found residue on my clothes. I got the clean & crisp scent, which is very light and subtle. If you are washing a smoker's clothes, you may want to get the lavender scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps my Clothes to Smell Nice
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and have had so many issues with detergents. This one does not irritate my skin and makes my clothes smell nice. I wish they had a few more scents, but overall, I like it and will keep ordering.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smells good but packaging is vulnerable
reviews.reviewText: I had a few pods that broke inside the box when it delivered. Left powder everywhere and leaking from the box, aside from wasted pods. Looks like the film they use to hold the pod is too vulnerable. Otherwise, the softener seems to be working well and my clothes smell good after wash.
